<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 10"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Ward Casting](/Feats.aspx?ID=1136) <actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Character Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=12) pg. 114 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Spellmaster](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=32)

**Prerequisites**
[Spellmaster Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=1134); [Steady Spellcasting](/Feats.aspx?ID=194)

**Trigger**
You attempt a flat check for Steady Spellcasting, but you haven’t rolled yet.

</column>

---

You carefully ward your spell by drawing from a mantle of magical energy you prepared to protect your casting, increasing your chance of retaining the spell. You reduce the DC of the flat check for Steady Spellcasting from 15 to 10.
name: Ward Casting
